nodes.documentation:
Constructor function
     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
     * Send `value` tokens to `to` from your account
     * @param to The address of the recipient
@param value the amount to send
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation:
Buy tokens
     * Add `value` tokens to the system irreversibly
     * @param value the amount of money to buy
@param buyer the address of the Buyer
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation:
Sell tokens
     * Remove `value` tokens to the system irreversibly
     * @param value the amount of money to sell
@param seller the address of the Seller
nodes.name: sell

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens of Another Account
     * Remove `value` tokens from the system irreversibly
     * @param value the amount of money to burn
@param _for the address of the owner of the tokens to burn
nodes.name: _burnFor

params.value: the amount of money to buy
the amount of money to sell

buy(uint256,address).notice: Buy tokens     * Add `value` tokens to the system irreversibly

methods.constructor: Constructor function     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract

sell(uint256,address).notice: Sell tokens     * Remove `value` tokens to the system irreversibly

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens     * Send `value` tokens to `to` from your account
